Articles.Content:
hi i am eran! im new at this game but i know how to get to orbit and how to get to the mun! but the only problem i have is that idk wtf are the names of the kind of orbit and reentery so i will love if someone can tell me what is the name of any kind of orbit or reentery or shot!

thanks you and greetings eran! 8)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Transfer orbit: Orbital path to take you to the Mun or Kerbol

Circular orbit: A circular orbit. Duh. ;P

Parabolic orbit: An orbit that looks like a parabola on a graph

Hyperbolic orbit: An orbit that looks like a hyperbola on a graph

Controlled reentry/descent: A controlled trajectory that takes you on a ballistic landing path

Uncontrolled reentry: The way you normally enter the atmosphere

Uncontrolled landing: A crash, and generally an explosion.

Ballistic trajectory: The path the rocket takes when it fails to make orbit.

Suborbital: Basically a ballistic trajectory, except intentional.

Fling: An orbital 'exploit' of sorts where you use a body\'s angular momentum to propel your own craft (only really usable on the Mun for now)

I learned so much.

???? ??? ???!
